metadata.title: CVE-2014-0048 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was found in Docker before 1.6.0. Some programs and scripts inDocker are downloaded via HTTP and then executed or used in unsafe ways.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1').
